#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<stack>
#include<math.h>
#define m 1000000007
using namespace std;
long int gcd(long int a,long int b)
{
if(b==0)
return a;
else
return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
     long int t,a,b,i,j,k,f;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {   f=1;
        cin>>a>>b;
        long int  n=gcd(a,b);
       i=0;
       j=1;
       for(k=2;k<=n;k++)
        {
         f=i+j;
         f=f%m;
         i=j;
         j=f;
       }
       cout<<f<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
